name: Pamou's jumping Adventures
description:
And here is the 3rd project of the year: Pamou's jumping Adventures! This game was created for the theme: Golf.

Here are the people who participated:

Game programmer : Charles Piercourt.

Game designers : Louis Gaubil (+ sounds) & Léa-Maria Ambrosio.

Game artists : Mahiedine Boudrissa (FX), Adam Lenglen (character), Mohima Islam (DA) and me (environment).

Don't hesitate to give us constructive feedback to improve us!
